title: Through a looking glass; Drama is -
creator_credit: Vincent O'Donnell and Victoria. Dept. of Education and Early Childhood Development
brief_description: Two drama education programs: “Through a looking glass” shows the major concepts underlaying drama in education and how the teacher can participate with the student in the dramatic process. “Drama is -” explores the ways in which drama can be used as a method to teach many subject areas.
